SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Customer Satisfaction ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Customer Satisfaction  is On-Time Delivery Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Customer Satisfaction ?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Customer Satisfaction  is Damage/Loss Rate .

SRP.Q: On the On-Time Delivery Rate , is the point for Carter, Becker and Proctor inside or outside the point for Koch Ltd?
SRP.A: On the On-Time Delivery Rate , the point for Carter, Becker and Proctor is inside the point for Koch Ltd.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Route Optimization Efficiency} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Koch Ltd?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Route Optimization Efficiency}, while the weakest aspect is{ Damage/Loss Rate }.

VPR.Q: On dimension On-Time Delivery Rate , which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On On-Time Delivery Rate , label {Carter, Becker and Proctor} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Route Optimization Efficiency, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Route Optimization Efficiency, label {Carter, Becker and Proctor} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Carter, Becker and Proctor on the On-Time Delivery Rate  in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Carter, Becker and Proctor on the Safety dimension is {30}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Koch Ltd on the Route Optimization Efficiency in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Koch Ltd on the Safety dimension is {99}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Carter, Becker and Proctor across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Carter, Becker and Proctor across all dimensions is {70}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Koch Ltd across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Koch Ltd across all dimensions is {34}.

NC.Q: For Carter, Becker and Proctor, which dimension has a higher score: Customer Satisfaction  or On-Time Delivery Rate ?
NC.A: {Customer Satisfaction } has a higher score than On-Time Delivery Rate  for Carter, Becker and Proctor.

NC.Q: On On-Time Delivery Rate , which label has a higher score: Koch Ltd or the Carter, Becker and Proctor?
NC.A: {Koch Ltd} has a higher score on On-Time Delivery Rate  compared to Carter, Becker and Proctor.

NC.Q: For Carter, Becker and Proctor, which dimension has a higher score: Route Optimization Efficiency or Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue or Customer Satisfaction ?
NC.A: {Route Optimization Efficiency} has a higher score for Carter, Becker and Proctor.

NC.Q: For Carter, Becker and Proctor, which dimension has a higher score: On-Time Delivery Rate  or Route Optimization Efficiency or Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue?
NC.A: {Route Optimization Efficiency} has a higher score for Carter, Becker and Proctor.

MSR.Q: For Carter, Becker and Proctor, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Carter, Becker and Proctor most needs to improve its {On-Time Delivery Rate }.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Koch Ltd}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Carter, Becker and Proctor}.
